short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow user to add product to their account at HasTashan.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lookbuzz is a new way to discover and shop for Fashion and Style. Join our fashion community to find inspiration, express your style and shop the latest trends at one place.

This extension enable you to add images of products, celebrity and style icons from across the web to Lookbuzz. And then those images will appear in your account at Lookbuzz. Afterword the you can use those images in look builder and outfit builder to create look and outfit.
